pageContext.claim: “We've been thinking about [firing the Navy Secretary] for a long time; that didn't just happen. And I have to protect my warfighters.”
pageContext.analysis: Spencer said he was likely to resign if ordered to restore Gallagher's trident because, he said, he could not "obey an order that I believe violates the sacred oath I took in the presence of my family, my flag and my faith to support and defend the Constitution of the United States."
